stories.text:
Hello, I’m Camilo from Cuba, I've created an Independent P2P Remittance & Donation Tool using Slyk that everyone can use and help Ukraine people. This is something that we use in Cuba because of our broken bank and money system.

The idea is to give a tool for families and businesses in Ukraine to process remittances (receive one currency and remit another to recipient) for their families and friends in Ukraine.

Anyone can launch such an independent remittance business by cloning this tool (for free) and receiving USD, EUR, or crypto, and delivering local USD, EUR or UAH.

Please check the documentation of the project on xfxhub.com, and I would appreciate any feedback. I’m also looking for links to sources for free-market rates for exchange in Ukraine. In Cuba, we have various sites that publish these exchange rates and I imagine they must exist in Ukraine too.

Best regards, Camilo.
stories.title: Independent P2P Remittance and Donation Tool to Support Ukraine People
